title: Heathcare Appointment Booking System
description: Built a full-stack web app that lets patients book doctor appointments with secure authentication and real-time slot management.

title: StrategiXchess (Real-Time Multiplayer Chess App)
description: Developed a real-time multiplayer chess platform with live gameplay, chat, and rule enforcement using WebSockets.

title: EmPower: Employee Management System
description: Created a task management system where admins assign tasks and employees track and update task progress.
